snippet: Ai Weiwei, the artist and critic of the Communist Party, said Friday that he had repaid loans totaling $1,400 that he had received online to help him pay back taxes and penalties that Chinese officials had levied against him.
abstract: Ai Weiwei, Chinese artist and critic of Communist Party, says he has repaid loans totaling $1,400 that he had received online to help him pay taxes and penalties that Chinese officials had levied against him.
lead_paragraph: Ai Weiwei, the artist and critic of the Communist Party, said Friday that he had repaid loans totaling $1,400 that he had received online to help him pay back taxes and penalties that Chinese officials had levied against him.
